entries.meaning: Without the presence or use of alphabetical letters.
examples: I passed by a ruined tomb in the midst of a garden-way, Upon whose letterless stone seven blood-red anemones lay.

entries.meaning: (of a person) Not having received a letter; (of a period of time) during which no letter is received.
examples: The prospect of seeing some one who had just seen Tom was very exciting, but Nina’s happiness was dampened by the fact that just about that time she had three letterless days.
